mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.book_isbn, b.book_name, b.book_author, b.book_intro, SUM(c.order_detail_qty) AS total_order_qty FROM books b JOIN customer_order_details c ON b.book_isbn = c.book_isbn GROUP BY b.book_isbn, b.book_name, b.book_author, b.book_intro ORDER BY total_order_qty DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT book_isbn, book_name, book_author, book_intro FROM books ORDER BY book_publish_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.book_isbn, b.book_name, b.book_author, b.book_intro, AVG(r.review_rating) AS avg_review_rating FROM books b JOIN customer_order_details c ON b.book_isbn = c.book_isbn JOIN reviews r ON c.order_detail_num = r.order_detail_num GROUP BY b.book_isbn, b.book_name, b.book_author, b.book_intro ORDER BY avg_review_rating DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT book_isbn, book_name, book_author, book_intro FROM books ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
